mapper.sql: study_history_sum_id, applicant_id, course_sum_id, study_time, study_count, course_time, course_cout, status, occupation, application_level, fullname, gender, identity_type, identity_no
mapper.insert: insert into study_history_sum(study_history_sum_id, applicant_id, course_sum_id, study_time, study_count, course_time, course_cout, status, occupation, application_level, fullname, gender, identity_type, identity_no) values(#{studyHistorySumId}, #{applicantId}, #{courseSumId}, #{studyTime}, #{studyCount}, #{courseTime}, #{courseCout}, #{status}, #{occupation}, #{applicationLevel}, #{fullname}, #{gender}, #{identityType}, #{identityNo})
mapper.update:
update study_history_sum
study_history_sum_id = #{studyHistorySumId},
applicant_id = #{applicantId},
course_sum_id = #{courseSumId},
study_time = #{studyTime},
study_count = #{studyCount},
course_time = #{courseTime},
course_cout = #{courseCout},
status = #{status},
occupation = #{occupation},
application_level = #{applicationLevel},
fullname = #{fullname},
gender = #{gender},
identity_type = #{identityType},
identity_no = #{identityNo},
where study_history_sum_id = #{studyHistorySumId}
